meanings.sent1: Yae! I am excited for the party.
meanings.sent2: She shouted 'yae' when she won the game.
meanings.sent3: Yae, let's go on an adventure!

meanings.sent1: The cat will yae kittens soon.
meanings.sent2: She yae a beautiful baby girl last night.
meanings.sent3: The farm animals yae new life every spring.
meanings.sent4: Her garden yae colorful flowers every summer.
meanings.sent5: The tree will yae fruits in the fall.

meanings.definition: A type of Japanese poetry consisting of 17 syllables in three lines of 5, 7, and 5 syllables
meanings.sent1: She wrote a yae about the changing seasons.
meanings.sent2: The students studied yae in their literature class.
meanings.sent3: His yae about nature was both beautiful and profound.
meanings.sent4: The yae competition showcased many talented poets.
meanings.sent5: Reading yae can be calming and inspiring.
